document_data.mainbody:
Slitherhorn was a wind instrument from Calimport that produced a peculiar reedy sound.
Slitherhorn was crafted out of snakeskin, shaped, stretched, and dried into a shape of long flute. The instrument was polished to appear sheeny.
In the , Cate Quirkilious, daughter of Thomas C. Quirkilious, the proprietor of Chromatic Scale musical instrument shop in Baldurs Gate, encountered slitherhorns during her trip to Calimport. She was impressed by the instruments peculiar sound and promised to bring it to the Gate and play it for her father.
